effect.name: Face blur
effect.description: Automatically detect and blur a face using OpenCV
effect.author: ZioKernel, Biilly, Jilt, Jaromil, Dan Dennedy

parameter.name: Search scale
Search scale
parameter.comment: The search window scale factor. For example, 120 = 1.20 = increases by 20% on each pass.

parameter.name: Neighbors
Neighbors
parameter.comment: Minimum number of rectangles that determines an object.

parameter.name: Smallest
Smallest
parameter.comment: The minimum window size in pixels.

parameter.name: Largest
Largest
parameter.comment: The largest size face in pixels - both horizontally and vertically (square window).

parameter.name: Recheck
Recheck
parameter.comment: How often to detect a face. In between checks, it does object motion tracking.

parameter.name: Ellipse
Show ellipse
parameter.comment: Draw a blue ellipse around the face area?
